# Battle of Tzeki

* British East India Company
|combatant2 =  Qing China
|commander1 = Hugh Gough,William Parker
|commander2 = General Yu Pu-yun
|strength1 = 1,260
|strength2 = 8,000 Bannermen
|casualties1 = 3 killed22 wounded
|casualties2 = 1,000+ killed
|notes =
}}
The Battle of Tzeki, Cixi, or '''Tsz'k√≠' was fought between British and Chinese forces in Tzeki (Cixi), Zhejiang province, China on 15 March 1842 during the First Opium War.
